summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5578 for the improvement of 28th Avenue West, from West Dravus Street to West Bertona Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 73150, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
